DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether Tanakan® is effective at slowing the progression from memory complaint to dementia of Alzheimer's type.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of EGb 761® (Tanakan®) in Dementia of Alzheimer Type Onset in Patients Suffering From Memory Complaints
DOC.criteria: Spontaneously reporting a memory complaint Short anxiety battery test < 6, (only if patient screened at GP site) Geriatric depression scale < 15 Minimental state (MMS) > 25 in GP's office (in hospital site MMS is done as complementary scale) Objective memory impairment Clinician rated dementia staging system > 0.5 Minimental state < 25 Dementia, past history of seizures, Parkinson disease
